Featured Project

Cineprime

Movies browser/tracker. MERN stack project with JWT authentication. Offers profile creation providing full functionality for registered users. Track and plan when to watch desired title while keeping track of the ones you've seen.
  • JS
  • React
  • JWT Auth
  • MongoDB
